title: Adventure/Action/Sci-Fi - Music Pack
longDescription:
This Pack is designed for Adventure, Action, Heroes, Sci-fi and Action-RPG games.


Listen here.


This pack contains 63 files: full tracks, loops, variations and layers;  appropriate for missions, action, cool moments, exploration, deep epic emotions, characters and battles.


All you need for interactive game music.
